message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $10,500?  This would still be a great value for you and a fair price for me.
